not-copied.title: Not copied
not-copied.body: You must generate a shortlink first before you can copy one.

copying-failed.title: An error occured
copying-failed.body: Could not copy shortend url to clipboard. Please try again or by hand.

invalid-url.title: Invalid URL
invalid-url.body: The entered URL is invalid. Please check the entered URL.

generating-failed.title: An error occured
generating-failed.body: Generating a shortlink failed. Please try again later.
